x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many underserved communities lack a simple way to find local healthcare, vaccination sites, or mental health resources. Information is scattered and difficult to navigate.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • UI Builder (for community portal).
  • CSM (for inquiries)
  • CMDB (to maintain directory of facilities/providers).
  • Now Assist (AI chatbot to answer questions).
  • Workspace (for support teams).

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

·  Integration with public health APIs (vaccination, hospital availability)

·  Geolocation/mapping services

·  Mobile-first design for accessibility

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Authentication security challenges to access public health APIs.
  • Geolocation services response times.
